JobFullDesc: AssociateMSET Reliability Production Engineers are responsible for ensuring the stability of Business critical low latency electronic trading environment and their associated infrastructure. The role will be based on New York and will entail both working closely with NY Business and our global partners. - Proactive identification of potential outages into iterative improvements & reactive ready-for-business checks & business workflows. - As a squad member, collaborate with business partners, software engineers and product owners where appropriate and notifying the business unit of system issues or failures in a timely manner. - Build tools for operational enhancements and increase ops efficiency. - Manage outage resolution calls, significant incidents/events and coordinating communications. - Maintain services once they are live by measuring and monitoring availability, latency and overall system health. - Manage outage resolutions calls, significant events and conduct blameless post incident reviews. - Liaise with internal teams, external parties to resolve issues.
